divs: Sighting Detailsno tail on the object i felt something in my heart that said look up and it happened a huge ball of light flew over at such a high rate of speed i notice it bend as it flew like it was circling the earth something was controlling it.i was on smithsation road heading west to the light of 208 right beside the blooms it was know as foodlion at that time.my house is only 2 to 3 miles away heading south on rt 208. about 6 yrs later i ran into a young guy how said he had seen the same thing i did on smithsation road past deerfield subdivision he said a large group of people seen it to they were at a school playing sports when it was seen. what made me belive it was a ufo is my mom was outside trying to see it as well. do to a report over her scanner saying it was called in flying over a base north of were i stay at . the base is call quntico i belive.
Summary: Ball of light 3 times bigger then a shotting star flew over head west when i got home mom was standing outside i asked why she said balls of light were reported over marine base near by.
